body: You can extract shading profiles from annual profiles output. [Here is an example](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Integrated_Daylight_and_Energy_simulation&slide=0&scale=5.067399625421505&offset=-2703.7694489706073,-1449.2803023741778) for lighting schedule, in your case you need to connect the output for shading.
